title: Gluware Launches Config ModelingTM to Accelerate Automation of ...
content:
SACRAMENTO, Calif.--([BUSINESS WIRE](https://www.businesswire.com/))--Gluware announced today a major innovation in the Gluware Control automation and orchestration platform enabling an industry first ability to leverage existing device configurations to accelerate automation using its new Config Modeling technology.

> @gluwareinc enables rapid automation of enterprise brownfield networks using Config Modeling #SDN #Automation
> 
> [Post this](https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180319005299/en/Gluware-Launches-Config-ModelingTM-to-Accelerate-Automation-of-Brownfield-Enterprise-Networks#)

Enterprise IT continues to struggle with network automation currently performing most configuration changes and compliance checks manually. Network complexity has slowed automation efforts created by multi-vendor devices deployed over many years, vendor unique syntax and lack of programmatic interfaces. While technologies like SDN and NFV show promise for the future, enterprises must operate an

title: Glue Networks Hires Former Intel CIO | Business Wire
content:
Glue Networks Hires Former Intel CIO | Business Wire
===============
                                         

[![Image 1: Business Wire](https://www.businesswire.com/images/bwlogo_extreme.png)](http://www.businesswire.com/)

  

**Glue Networks Hires Former Intel CIO**
========================================

December 18, 2012 08:12 AM Eastern Standard Time 

SACRAMENTO, Calif.--([BUSINESS WIRE](https://www.businesswire.com/))--[Glue Networks, Inc.](http://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink&url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.gluenetworks.com%2F&esheet=50510890&lan=en-US&anchor=Glue+Networks%2C+Inc.&index=1&md5=f01ec522373fab32a25a99035edbf3b1), developer and provider of the world’s most advanced software defined network (SDN) automation platform, today announced that it has appointed John ‘JJ’ Johnson, former Intel CIO as Executive Director.

> “We are delighted to entice a Silicon Valley luminary out of retirement to be part of our team, helping to set strategic direction for Glue Networks
